section.title: Version 0.6
section.para: The XML document includes a processing instruction to invoke an XSLT stylesheet &yaxx.xsl; that transforms it back into a valid correct program.
The Fortran lex analyzer is modified to report the value of terminals. The SLABEL terminal is treated specially to add a new line before each statement.

section.title: Version 0.5
section.para: The text that contains XML special entities such as '&amp', '>' and '<' are replaced with "&", ">" and "<" respectively.
The XML grammar from Lex and Yacc course is added.

section.title: Version 0.4
section.para: The Java grammar from Bronnikov is added.

section.title: Version 0.3
section.para: Solved problem for '+' like terminals in both XML and DTD.
The SQL grammar from J.Levine et al &lex-and-yacc; is added.

section.title: Version 0.2
section.para: The XML output is adjusted to include the DTD and name space declaration.

section.title: Version 0.1
section.para: The initial version released, with the XML output.
